name: Kret
description:
Story!

Help our little friend Kret to rescure his favourite Tree! It was such a beautiful day but You run out of water! To keep Kret's Tree alive you have to collect water drops in the garden or try your luck in dangerous routes of underground tunnel. Are you brave enough to check if everything below is as above the ground?

Gameplay Instructions:

WSAD - Movement 
Mouse - Camera Movement 
E - Water the tree
Shift during running - Slide
Space - Jump, press it one more in the air and You can double jump!
ESC - Pause
